meanings.sent1: My paisanas and I always have fun together.
meanings.sent2: She introduced me to her paisanas at the party.
meanings.sent3: The paisanas giggled as they shared stories.
meanings.sent4: Her paisanas were like a bouquet of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: I cherish the bond I have with my paisanas.

meanings.definition: A group of female friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: The paisanas gathered for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: They formed a close-knit group of paisanas in college.
meanings.sent3: The paisanas planned a surprise party for their friend.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a strong fortress, like a group of paisanas.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the paisanas echoed through the room.
